item.description:
Body Mind Systems in Stoneham, in cooperation with Rachel Gargano of RG Nutrition and Wellness, reminds you that your RSVP is needed by Tuesday January 10, 2012 to ensure you have a place and dinner at our Executive Energy Seminar on Thursday January 12, 2012 6:30 PM – 8:00 PM at Doucet Remodeling, One Central Street, Stoneham Massachusetts.

Space is limited and seats are running out!

This is an awesome opportunity to start your new year having your nutrition and physical activity questions asked and answered. We look forward to seeing you soon!


Kind regards,

Bob Lee
Head Instructor
3rd Degree Black Belt
www.bodymindsystems.com


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
EXECUTIVE ENERGY: MEALS & MOVEMENT TO IMPROVE FOCUS AND HEALTH

Thursday January 12, 2012 6:30 PM – 8:00 PM
Cost: $15 per person.
Location: Doucet Remodeling & Design, One Central Street, Stoneham, MA 02180
Registration Deadline: Thursday January 5, 2012; space is limited

Join us for Dinner!

Do you need more energy to make it through the day? Join Body Mind Systems and RG Nutrition and Wellness for a night of Tai-Chi and Stretching, followed by a nutrition and information-packed food demonstration and meal.

This night of food and fun will be held at the beautiful Doucet Remodeling & Design showroom in downtown Stoneham, MA.

Learn how to unleash your mind and body’s strength through the use of nutrition and martial arts movements and principles.

During this great night you will:

  • Learn to help prevent health problems through martial arts movements that will increase your flexibility, circulation and range of motion.
  • Watch a live cooking demonstration and discover cooking techniques to create easy, delicious, and healthy meals.
  • Enjoy a full dinner and an opportunity to ask all your nutrition and physical wellness questions.


To sign up, please call 781.279.1400 or email Bob Lee of Body Mind Systems at bob.lee@bodymindsystems.com

**Snow date: January 26, 2012

http://www.rgnutritionandwellness.com/RGNutritionandWellness/index.php/calendar/dinner-tai-chi

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
LOOKING FOR THE LATEST INFORMATION AND EVENTS IN STONEHAM?

http://www.stonehamone.com/
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
DO YOU KNOW MILITARY VETERANS OR PEOPLE WHO KNOW RETURNING VETERANS?

Military veterans can sign up for our beginner's program and receive a 50% discount while training on our beginner's program; if they invite friends and family, those individuals will receive a 25% discount while training on our beginner's program (Regular Value: $165 per month).

We offer adult training 6 days a week (Monday-Friday 7:00 PM-8:00 PM, Mondays/Wednesdays/Fridays 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM and Saturdays 11:00 AM - 12:00 PM). Normally, the cost for training is $165 for one month of our beginner's program which includes all of these class times.

The training includes breathing exercises, a warm-up for conditioning the legs, upper body and core strength, learning martial arts forms and movement, and practicing self-defense techniques.

Most of our adult students are investors, executives, professionals, managers, self-employed consultants and honors students who understand the value of a strong mind and body so as to have greater happiness and success in life.

In our observation, many veterans are returning without a strong sense of direction or long-term goals. Our hope is for them to use the training to help them create greater meaning and self-direction for their lives and to benefit themselves and others around them.

group.name: Boston/North Shore Martial Arts Meetup Group

item.name: Executive Energy: Meals and Movement To Improve Focus And Health
